description:
It`s the season for student teachers at Mai High.  Keima`s class gets Miss Nagase, a cheerful pro wrestling fan who has great hopes and dreams about becoming a teacher.
However, her attention is immediately drawn to a problem child who plays games during class (...Keima, of course).
The other teachers have already given up on Keima`s attitude, but Jun is inspired to save him...
Source: crunchyroll
